name: Margherita
description: ...pizza is known for its ingredients representing the colours of the Italian flag. When all of these delicious flavours are combined on a hand-kneaded pizza base, a universally-adored pizza is created.

name: Pepperoni
description: ...pizza is a popular choice among pizza lovers. Its deliciously spicy, crispy pepperoni slices are perfectly complemented by the richness of melted mozzarella and tangy tomato sauce.

name: Hawaiian
description: ...pizza is a sweet and savory classic that blends the tropical taste of pineapple with the rich flavor of ham. The perfect balance of tangy and salty flavors, all on a soft, cheesy pizza crust.

name: Four Cheeses
description: ...pizza is for those who love the rich taste of multiple cheeses. This pizza combines four well-known cheese to create a creamy, indulgent experience that cheese lovers can't resist.

name: Vegetarian
description: ...pizza is a vibrant medley of fresh vegetables piled on a bed of tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese. A healthy, tasty, and filling option for plant-based eaters.

name: BBQ Chicken
description: ...pizza is perfect for those who love smoky, tangy flavors. The tender chicken is marinated in barbecue sauce, and combined with red onions, mozzarella, and a drizzle of additional BBQ sauce.

name: Meat Lovers
description: ...pizza is packed with a variety of meats, including pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham. If you're craving a hearty, protein-filled pizza, this one is for you.

name: Seafood
description: ...pizza offers a unique taste with a mix of shrimp, mussels, and calamari. This pizza is perfect for seafood lovers who enjoy fresh, delicate flavors topped with a bit of garlic and herbs.

name: Buffalo Chicken
description: ...pizza delivers the spicy kick of buffalo sauce paired with tender, crispy chicken. It's a perfect combination of heat and flavor, finished off with a cool drizzle of ranch dressing.

name: Caprese
description: ...pizza features fresh mozzarella, basil, and ripe tomatoes, drizzled with balsamic glaze. It's a light, refreshing pizza perfect for those who prefer a more delicate, non-saucy option.

name: Texas Burger
description: ...pizza is like having a burger and pizza all in one. This pizza is topped with ground beef, cheddar cheese, onions, pickles, and a smoky barbecue sauce for a true Texas-inspired meal.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: ...pizza is a creamy delight, featuring tender chicken, a rich alfredo sauce, and mozzarella cheese. It's a luxurious take on a classic pizza with comforting flavors.

name: Supreme
description: ...pizza is loaded with all the best toppings - pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, green peppers, onions, and olives. It's the ultimate pizza for those who want to enjoy a little bit of everything.

name: Chicken Bacon Ranch
description: ...pizza combines the savory flavors of crispy bacon and tender chicken, all smothered in a creamy ranch sauce and topped with mozzarella cheese.

name: Greek
description: ...pizza is a Mediterranean delight, featuring Kalamata olives, feta cheese, red onions, and spinach. This pizza is perfect for those who enjoy bold, savory flavors.

name: Cheeseburger
description: ...pizza is the perfect fusion of two favorite foods. It's topped with beef, cheddar cheese, lettuce, pickles, onions, and a special sauce, creating a pizza that's both hearty and flavorful.

name: Pesto Chicken
description: ...pizza is topped with a fresh basil pesto sauce, grilled chicken, sun-dried tomatoes, and mozzarella cheese, creating a savory, aromatic experience.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: ...pizza features breaded chicken, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, and a sprinkle of parmesan, offering a rich and comforting flavor.

name: Marinara
description: ...pizza is a classic, simple pizza topped with a savory tomato sauce, garlic, oregano, and a sprinkle of parmesan. A pizza that's all about the rich flavor of the sauce.

name: Cheese Sticks
description: ...are a delicious appetizer or side dish, made from mozzarella cheese wrapped in pizza dough and baked until golden. Served with marinara sauce for dipping.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: ...pizza features tender, smoky ribs paired with mozzarella cheese, onions, and a rich barbecue sauce. A pizza that brings the flavors of the grill to your plate.

name: Spicy Buffalo
description: ...pizza is for those who like a bit of heat. Topped with spicy buffalo chicken, mozzarella, and a drizzle of ranch dressing, this pizza is both fiery and delicious.

name: Vegetarian Supreme
description: ...pizza is loaded with fresh vegetables, including bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and spinach, all on a bed of tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.

name: Italian Sausage
description: ...pizza is a savory option, featuring crumbled Italian sausage, bell peppers, onions, and a sprinkle of parmesan, all topped with mozzarella cheese.
